item.title: CC0 Textures & Models | Share Textures
item.description: ShareTextures.com Free PBR Textures and models archive include wood, stone, wall, ground, metal and more. Download free models and textures up to 4K resolution.
item.author: (Share Textures)

item.title: LogLog Games
item.description: Disclaimer: This post is a very long collection of thoughts and problems I've had over the years, and also addresses some of the arguments I've been repeatedly told. This post expresses my opinion the has been formed over using Rust for gamedev for many thousands of hours over many years, and multiple finished games. This isn't meant to brag or indicate success, but rather just show there has been more than enough effort put into Rust, to dispel the the commonly said "once you gain enough experience it'll all make sense" argument.

item.title: C# 13 Params Collections
item.description: With the version 17.10.0 Preview 3.0 of Visual Studio Preview you can test some new C# 13 features. In this blog I will explain the params Collection feature as documented in this proposal. To use this feature you have to set the LangVersion in your csproj file to preview.
